headline.print_headline: Thai Protest Leader Arrested on Several Charges
headline.main: Thai Protest Leader Arrested on Several Charges

docs.snippet: Thai police said Saturday that they have arrested a key anti-government protest leader and charged him with offenses including insurrection, risking further political confrontations even though a court freed him on bail hours later....
docs.lead_paragraph: Thai police said Saturday that they have arrested a key anti-government protest leader and charged him with offenses including insurrection, risking further political confrontations even though a court freed him on bail hours later.

headline.print_headline: In Maine, Rand Paul Says GOP Must Grow to Win
headline.main: In Maine, Rand Paul Says GOP Must Grow to Win

docs.snippet: The Republican Party must become a bigger coalition that welcomes diverse ideas to win national elections, Sen. Rand Paul said Saturday at the Maine Republican Party convention....
docs.lead_paragraph: The Republican Party must become a bigger coalition that welcomes diverse ideas to win national elections, Sen. Rand Paul said Saturday at the Maine Republican Party convention.

headline.print_headline: Toews Lifts Blackhawks Past Blues 3-2 in OT
headline.main: Toews Lifts Blackhawks Past Blues 3-2 in OT

docs.snippet: Duncan Keith came clean: He just wanted to clear the puck out of danger. Somehow, it found Jonathan Toews' stick....
docs.lead_paragraph: Duncan Keith came clean: He just wanted to clear the puck out of danger. Somehow, it found Jonathan Toews' stick.

headline.print_headline: SUV Rams People at Ice Cream Shop; 1 Dead, 6 Hurt
headline.main: SUV Rams People at Ice Cream Shop; 1 Dead, 6 Hurt

docs.snippet: An SUV surged forward from a parking space into a small crowd waiting outside a Los Angeles-area ice cream parlor, killing a 73-year-old woman and leaving six people injured....
docs.lead_paragraph: An SUV surged forward from a parking space into a small crowd waiting outside a Los Angeles-area ice cream parlor, killing a 73-year-old woman and leaving six people injured.

headline.print_headline: Diggers Find Atari's E.T. Games in Landfill
headline.main: Diggers Find Atari's E.T. Games in Landfill

docs.snippet: A decades-old urban legend was put to rest Saturday when workers for a documentary film production company recovered "E.T." Atari game cartridges from a heap of garbage buried deep in the New Mexico desert....
docs.lead_paragraph: A decades-old urban legend was put to rest Saturday when workers for a documentary film production company recovered "E.T." Atari game cartridges from a heap of garbage buried deep in the New Mexico desert.

headline.print_headline: 3 Men Convicted of Killing Iran Prosecutor Hanged
headline.main: 3 Men Convicted of Killing Iran Prosecutor Hanged

docs.snippet: Iran's official news agency is reporting that three men convicted of killing an Iranian prosecutor in the country's restive border region with Pakistan have been executed....
docs.lead_paragraph: Iran's official news agency is reporting that three men convicted of killing an Iranian prosecutor in the country's restive border region with Pakistan have been executed.

headline.print_headline: Homeland Security Struggles to Tempt, Retain Cyber Talent
headline.main: Homeland Security Struggles to Tempt, Retain Cyber Talent

docs.snippet: In the race to attract cybersecurity experts to protect the government's computer networks, the Department of Homeland Security has a handicap money can't fix....
docs.lead_paragraph: In the race to attract cybersecurity experts to protect the government's computer networks, the Department of Homeland Security has a handicap money can't fix.

docs.snippet: "The world has not yet forgotten World War II, but Russia is already keen on starting World War III." — Arseniy Yatsenyuk, Ukraine's acting prime minister, as top officials in Kiev spoke of imminent invasion from Russia....
docs.lead_paragraph: "The world has not yet forgotten World War II, but Russia is already keen on starting World War III." — Arseniy Yatsenyuk, Ukraine's acting prime minister, as top officials in Kiev spoke of imminent invasion from Russia.

headline.main: Communist Mouthpiece Says it Complained to Twitter About Parody

docs.snippet: People’s Daily, the flagship paper of China’s Communist Party, continued its assault on a Twitter account that parodies the country’s rulers, saying it violates Twitter’s rules....
docs.abstract: People’s Daily, the flagship paper of China’s Communist Party, continued its assault on a Twitter account that parodies the country’s rulers, saying it violates Twitter’s rules.

headline.print_headline: Francis Praises Saintly Popes as Good, Heroic
headline.main: Francis Praises Saintly Popes as Good, Heroic
